articles.content: Years of hard work and perseverance have finally given the results for many sportspersons with the release of the list of the National Sports Awards winners by the Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sport… [+4508 chars]

articles.title: Why chess Grandmaster-siblings Praggnanandhaa and Vaishali will limit the number of tournaments they play in before the Candidates tournament - The Indian Express
articles.description: Coach RB Ramesh says they will find a balance between playing tournament and preparation; two separate teams with seconds already in place.
articles.content: Multiple training camps with focus on each and every opponent. Two separate teams with seconds already identified to share all available information about the opponents. Limiting the number of tourna… [+4885 chars]

articles.title: Gill's world No. 1 reign cut short by Babar, Bishnoi displaced in just 12 days - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Babar Azam has replaced Shubman Gill as the No.1-ranked ODI batter in the world. | Cricket
articles.content: Babar Azam has replaced Shubman Gill as the No. 1 ODI batter in the world with the star Pakistan batter taking back the position in less than 45 days after surrendering it. Gill, who on November 8 di… [+2010 chars]
